ability.name: Codex Discipline
ability.description: At the start of your Command phase, if you have Battle-shock tokens on any of your ULTRAMARINES units, you can remove one of those Battle-shock tokens.

abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Spiritual Leaders
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, this model's unit has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

abilities.description: This model can be attached to Assault Intercessor Squad, Intercessor Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad, or Tactical Squad.

abilities.name: Psychic Hood
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

abilities.name: Mental Fortress
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

abilities.description: This model can be attached to Assault Intercessor Squad, Intercessor Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad, or Tactical Squad.

abilities.name: Narthecium
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, in your Command phase, you can return 1 destroyed model (excluding Character models) to that unit.

abilities.name: Oath of Moment
abilities.description: If you have an Oath of Moment target, each time a model in this unit makes an attack against it, re-roll Hit and Wound rolls.

abilities.name: Shock Assault
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, if this unit made a Charge move this turn, add 1 to the Strength of that attack.

abilities.name: Fury of the First
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets your Oath of Moment target, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Heavy Fire Support
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible enemy unit, that attack has the [Lethal Hits] ability.

abilities.name: Cleansing Flames
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of this unit's Pyreblasters this phase. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and deployed more than 9" from enemy models.

abilities.name: Fury of the First
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets your Oath of Moment target, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Teleport Homer
abilities.description: At the start of the battle, you can set up one Teleport Homer token. Once per battle, this unit can use the Rapid Ingress Stratagem for 0CP if set up within 3" of that token.

abilities.name: Bladeguard
abilities.description: At the start of the Fight phase, select one: Swords of the Chapter (re-roll Hit rolls of 1) or Shields of the Imperium (re-roll invulnerable saves of 1).

abilities.name: Sternguard Focus
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. While this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

abilities.name: For the Chapter!
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit is destroyed by a ranged attack, if that model has not shot this phase, roll a D6. On a 3+, do not remove it from play; that model can shoot after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

abilities.name: Close-quarters Firepower
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

abilities.name: Total Obliteration
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, re-roll a Damage roll of 1.

abilities.name: Duty Eternal
abilities.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack (to a minimum of 1).

abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Signum
abilities.description: Each time this unit is selected to shoot, you can select one model in this unit equipped with a signum. If you do, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the Ignores Cover ability.

abilities.name: Armorium Cherub
abilities.description: Once per battle, after making a Hit roll for a model in this unit, you can change that roll to a 6.

abilities.name: Hammer of Wrath
abilities.description: Each time this unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6 for each model in this unit that is within Engagement Range: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: Unit can be set up in Reserves and deployed more than 9" from enemies during the Reinforcements step.

abilities.name: Turbo-boost
abilities.description: Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.

abilities.name: Turbo-boost
abilities.description: Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.

abilities.name: Outrider Escort
abilities.description: Once per turn, in your opponent's Shooting phase, when a friendly Adeptus Astartes Mounted unit within 6" of this unit is selected as a target, after that enemy unit has finished making its attacks, this unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit.

abilities.name: Target Sighted
abilities.description: At the start of your Shooting phase, select one enemy unit that is visible to this model. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly Adeptus Astartes model makes an attack with a Blast weapon that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Hit roll.

rules.name: Combat Doctrines
rules.description: At the start of your Command phase, select one Combat Doctrine to be active until your next Command phase. Each can only be selected once per battle. Devastator: Eligible to shoot after Advancing. Tactical: Eligible to shoot and charge after Falling Back. Assault: Eligible to charge after Advancing.

stratagems.name: Only In Death Does Duty End
stratagems.description: When a model in your unit is destroyed, if it hasn't fought, it can fight before being removed.

stratagems.name: Armour of Contempt
stratagems.description: Until end of phase, worsen AP of attacks targeting your unit by 1.

stratagems.name: Honour the Chapter
stratagems.description: Melee weapons gain [Lance]. While Assault Doctrine is active, also improve AP by 1.

stratagems.name: Storm of Fire
stratagems.description: Ranged weapons gain [Ignores Cover]. While Devastator Doctrine is active, also improve AP by 1.

stratagems.name: Adaptive Strategy
stratagems.description: Select one unit. Until end of phase, a Combat Doctrine of your choice is active for that unit.

stratagems.name: Squad Tactics
stratagems.description: After enemy ends a move within 9", your Infantry/Mounted unit can move up to D6".

enhancements.name: Artificer Armour
enhancements.description: The bearer has a 2+ Save and Feel No Pain 5+.

enhancements.name: The Honour Vehement
enhancements.description: +1 Attack and +1 Strength to melee weapons. +2 each while Assault Doctrine is active.

enhancements.name: Adept of the Codex
enhancements.description: At the start of Command phase, you can activate Tactical Doctrine for bearer's unit only.

enhancements.name: Fire Discipline
enhancements.description: While leading a unit, ranged weapons have [Sustained Hits 1].

rules.name: Shadow Masters
rules.description: Your Phobos units have the Stealth ability and benefit from cover even in the open while more than 12" from enemy units.

stratagems.name: Guerrilla Tactics
stratagems.description: Phobos Infantry not in Engagement Range can be placed in Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.name: A Deadly Prize
stratagems.description: Phobos unit leaves objective. Next enemy that controls it takes D3 mortal wounds.

stratagems.name: Multi-spectrum Array
stratagems.description: Phobos unit gains [Ignores Cover] and [Sustained Hits 1] this phase.

stratagems.name: Path of Shadows
stratagems.description: After Advancing, Phobos Infantry can make a Normal Move of 6".

stratagems.name: Strike from the Shadows
stratagems.description: If unit charged from wholly within terrain, weapons gain [Lethal Hits].

stratagems.name: The Void Lies in Wait
stratagems.description: Select enemy within 12" of 3 Phobos units. It must take a Battle-shock test at -2.

enhancements.name: The Vox Espiritum
enhancements.description: Extend range of Scouts and Infiltrator auras by 3". Adjacent Phobos units get +1 to Hit on turn they arrive from Reserves.

enhancements.name: Execute and Fade
enhancements.description: Once per turn, after bearer's unit destroys an enemy, it can make a Normal Move of 6".

enhancements.name: Shadow War Veteran
enhancements.description: Once per battle, at end of Fight phase, bearer's unit and one enemy unit within 6" take D6 mortal wounds. Bearer's unit can then move D6" away.

enhancements.name: Lord of Deceit
enhancements.description: After both sides deploy, redeploy up to 3 Phobos units or place them in Strategic Reserves.

rules.name: Close-range Eradication
rules.description: In your Shooting phase, after a unit shoots, select one enemy unit hit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. Vehicles/Monsters take the test at -1.

stratagems.name: Immolation Protocols
stratagems.description: Torrent weapons gain [Lethal Hits]. If target is Battle-shocked, gain [Devastating Wounds] instead.

stratagems.name: Burning Vengeance
stratagems.description: When your unit is destroyed, it can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase.

stratagems.name: Superhuman Accuracy
stratagems.description: Ranged weapons gain +1 to Hit. If unit didn't move, +1 to Wound instead.

stratagems.name: Aggressive Advance
stratagems.description: Unit Advances 6" instead of D6". Can still shoot this turn.

stratagems.name: Purge the Foe
stratagems.description: Ranged weapons gain [Sustained Hits 1]. Against Battle-shocked, [Sustained Hits 2] instead.

stratagems.name: Thermal Detonation
stratagems.description: Melta weapons gain [Devastating Wounds] this phase.

enhancements.name: Adamantine Mantle
enhancements.description: +1 Toughness. Each time bearer is destroyed, roll D6 - on 2+, set up at end of phase with 3 wounds.

enhancements.name: Forged in Battle
enhancements.description: While leading, Torrent weapons in unit gain [Twin-linked].

enhancements.name: War-tempered Artifice
enhancements.description: Melta weapons gain +2 Damage against Vehicles/Monsters. Other ranged gain +1 Damage vs same.

enhancements.name: Vulkan's Mantle
enhancements.description: While leading, at start of Command phase, one model in unit regains up to D3 wounds.

rules.name: Extremis-level Threat
rules.description: At the start of battle, select one unit in enemy army. Each time a model makes an attack against that unit, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: Veteran Instincts
stratagems.description: Terminator or Veteran unit can use the Fire Overwatch or Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP this phase.

stratagems.name: Duty and Honour
stratagems.description: Terminator/Veteran unit within range of objective auto-passes Battle-shock test and has +1 OC until next Command phase.

stratagems.name: Unmatched Skill
stratagems.description: When attacking Extremis target, Critical Hits score 2 additional hits instead of 1.

stratagems.name: Inevitable Vengeance
stratagems.description: When Terminator/Veteran fights Extremis target, re-roll Damage rolls.

stratagems.name: Martial Excellence
stratagems.description: Terminator/Veteran unit's melee weapons gain [Sustained Hits 1] and [Lethal Hits].

stratagems.name: Heroes of the Chapter
stratagems.description: When Character or Terminator destroyed, it can fight before removal if it hasn't fought this phase.

enhancements.name: Champion of the Imperium
enhancements.description: +3 Attacks. When bearer destroys an enemy Character/Monster/Vehicle in melee, gain 1CP.

enhancements.name: Master of the Watch
enhancements.description: Friendly Terminator/Veteran units within 6" have OC +1.

enhancements.name: Strategic Veteran
enhancements.description: Each time you target bearer's unit with Stratagem, roll D6 - on 4+ gain 1CP.

oath_of_moment.name: Oath of Moment
oath_of_moment.description: At the start of your Command phase, select one enemy unit to be the target of your Oath of Moment. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model from your army with this ability makes an attack that targets that unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

weapon.name: Assault
weapon.description: Can shoot after Advancing at -1 to hit.

weapon.name: Heavy
weapon.description: +1 to hit if bearer Remained Stationary.

weapon.name: Rapid Fire X
weapon.description: Double attacks when targeting within half range.

weapon.name: Pistol
weapon.description: Can shoot in Engagement Range at units in Engagement Range.

weapon.name: Blast
weapon.description: +1 attack per 5 models in target unit.

weapon.name: Hazardous
weapon.description: After shooting, roll D6 per hazardous weapon. On 1, bearer takes 3 mortal wounds.

weapon.name: Devastating Wounds
weapon.description: Critical wounds inflict mortal wounds instead of normal damage.

weapon.name: Sustained Hits X
weapon.description: Critical hits generate X additional hits.

weapon.name: Ignores Cover
weapon.description: Target does not benefit from cover.

weapon.name: Melta X
weapon.description: Add X to Damage when targeting within half range.

weapon.name: Anti-X Y+
weapon.description: Critical wound on Y+ against targets with keyword X.

unit.name: Deep Strike
unit.description: Can deploy from Reserves more than 9" from enemies.

unit.name: Scouts X"
unit.description: Can make a Normal move of X" before first turn.

unit.name: Infiltrators
unit.description: Can deploy anywhere more than 9" from enemies and their deployment zone.

unit.name: Stealth
unit.description: Ranged attacks targeting have -1 to hit.

unit.name: Lone Operative
unit.description: Cannot be targeted unless within 12" unless it's the closest target.

unit.name: Feel No Pain X+
unit.description: Each time model loses a wound, roll D6 - on X+, wound is ignored.

unit.name: Deadly Demise X
unit.description: When destroyed, roll D6 - on 6, nearby units take X mortal wounds.

unit.name: Leader
unit.description: Character can be attached to specified units.
